trans-unit.source: Provides extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) serialization services for an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> at design time.
trans-unit.target: Tillhandahåller extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) serialisering för en <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> i designläge.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] ActivityMarkupSerializer provides methods that serialize activity class objects into XAML format and deserialize XAML content into activity class objects.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]ActivityMarkupSerializer innehåller metoder som serialisera aktivitet klassobjekt i XAML-formatet och deserialisera XAML-innehållet i aktiviteten klassobjekt.

trans-unit.source: These services are primarily used by activity designers to persist the classes on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Dessa tjänster används främst av aktivitetsdesigners för att bevara klasser i designvyn i arbetsflödet.

trans-unit.source: For more information about serialization, see [Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Läs mer om serialisering [serialisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the specified <xref:System.Type> using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en instans av den angivna <xref:System.Type>med hjälp av den angivna <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> to use in this instance creation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref> ska användas vid skapande av den här instansen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to create.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>skapa.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the newly created <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: En referens till den nyligen skapade <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The index of the last character in the activity definition.
trans-unit.target: Indexet för det sista tecknet i aktivitetsdefinitionen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: The index of the last line in the activity definition.
trans-unit.target: Index för den sista raden i aktivitetsdefinitionen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer"></xref> that an object has just been serialized.
trans-unit.target: Meddelar den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer"> </xref> som ett objekt bara har serialiseras.

trans-unit.source: OnAfterSerialize is called immediately after the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A> method runs and performs post-serialization processing on `obj`, primarily formatting and indenting code and extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) in the .xoml file.
trans-unit.target: OnAfterSerialize anropas omedelbart efter den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A>körs och utför efter serialisering bearbetning på `obj`, främst formatering och dra in kod och extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) i XOML-filen.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> that manages the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref> som hanterar serialisering processen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that was serialized.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>som serialiserades.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer"></xref> that an object is about to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Meddelar den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer"> </xref> att ett objekt ska serialiseras.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer.OnAfterSerialize%2A> is called immediately before the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A> method runs on the activity specified by `obj`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer.OnAfterSerialize%2A>anropas omedelbart före den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A>metoden körs på den aktivitet som anges av `obj`.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A></xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer.OnAfterSerialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: OnBeforeSerialize writes the opening extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) tag for the activity, including any required attributes.
trans-unit.target: OnBeforeSerialize skriver extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) starttaggen för aktivitet, inklusive alla obligatoriska attribut.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> that manages the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref> som hanterar serialisering processen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>serialiseras.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: serializationManager, obj, or writer contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: serializationManager, obj, eller writer innehåller en null-referens ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: obj is not of type .
trans-unit.target: objär inte av typen .

trans-unit.source: The index of the first character in the activity definition.
trans-unit.target: Indexet för det första tecknet i aktivitetsdefinitionen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: The index of the first line in the activity definition.
trans-unit.target: Indexet för den första raden i aktivitetsdefinitionen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.
